title: Qonto Connection
description: OAuth-based integration with Qonto banking platform for financial automation

specs.title: Create Qonto connection with valid OAuth credentials
specs.given: valid Qonto OAuth client ID and secret from Qonto developer console
specs.when: user creates a new Qonto connection
specs.then: connection is created successfully and OAuth flow can be initiated

specs.title: Reject Qonto connection with invalid credentials
specs.when: user attempts to create Qonto connection
specs.then: system returns validation error indicating credential issue

specs.title: Update Qonto connection name
specs.when: user updates connection name to a valid unique value
